html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-05272023-06-01GAC
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectOrder Authorizing the Amendments to Annex III of the Rotterdam Convention on the Prior Informed Consent Procedure for Certain Hazardous Chemicals and Pesticides in International Trade
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary to accept, on behalf of Canada, the AMENDMENTS TO ANNEX III OF THE ROTTERDAM CONVENTION ON THE PRIOR INFORMED CONSENT PROCEDURE FOR CERTAIN HAZARDOUS CHEMICALS AND PESTICIDES IN INTERNATIONAL TRADE, adopted during the tenth meeting of the Conference of the Parties to the Rotterdam Convention held in Geneva from June 6 to 17, 2022.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Authorizing the Amendments to Annex III of the Rotterdam Convention on the Prior Informed Consent Procedure for Certain Hazardous Chemicals and Pesticides in International Trade
precis: Order authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary to accept, on behalf of Canada, the AMENDMENTS TO ANNEX III OF THE ROTTERDAM CONVENTION ON THE PRIOR INFORMED CONSENT PROCEDURE FOR CERTAIN HAZARDOUS CHEMICALS AND PESTICIDES IN INTERNATIONAL TRADE, adopted during the tenth meeting of the Conference of the Parties to the Rotterdam Convention held in Geneva from June 6 to 17, 2022.
